id="S:0"><div class="[&amp;&gt;*+*]:mt-5 grid whitespace-pre-wrap"><ol class="space-y-2 w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><li class="leading-normal flex class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="/team-posts/antons-posts/hunting-malicious-macros#first">Hunting Malicious Macros</a></p></div></li></ol><h2 id="hunting-malicious-macros" class="text-3xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[1em]"><a href="#hunting-malicious-macros" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-tight"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[1em]">Hunting Malicious Macros</div></h2><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Taking a look at the MITRE ATT&amp;CK page for malicious macros, it&#x27;s clear that this technique is a favourite among APT groups.</p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Microsoft Office is indeed ubiquitous in a corporate office setting and presents defenders with a very large attack surface.</p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">&quot;<i class="font-italic">Just disable macros</i>&quot; is a great idea, but many critical business processes run on the back of decades-old macros; for better or for worse.</p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">To get a sense of how widely malicious macros are utilized, take a look at the technique via MITRE: <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://attack.mitre.org/beta/techniques/T1566/001/">T1566.001</a></p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">In this post I will cover detection techniques that provide relatively robust coverage for detecting malicious macros in your own environment. I&#x27;ll be using Sysmon to generate the log data and Splunk to query that data, I&#x27;ll also highlight some Sigma rules that can help with Macro detections.</p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Before I dive in, I need to acknowledge that this work <strong class="font-bold">definitely</strong> stands on the shoulders of giants and I&#x27;ll be referencing their work heavily throughout.</p><h3 id="atomic-red-team" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#atomic-red-team" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">Atomic Red Team</div></h3><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Red Canary have done the defensive world a huge solid and have provided a script that generates macros for you so that detections can be tested, so let&#x27;s start there:</p><ul class="space-y-2 w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://redcanary.com/blog/testing-initial-access-with-generate-macro-in-atomic-red-team/">Blog Post</a></p></div></li><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/master/ARTifacts/Initial_Access/generate-macro.ps1">Script Used</a></p></div></li></ul><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><code class="py-[1px] px-1.5 min-w-[1.625rem] inline-flex justify-center items-center ring-1 ring-inset ring-dark/1 bg-dark/[0.06] rounded text-dark/8 dark:ring-light/1 dark:bg-light/1 dark:text-light/7 text-[.875em] leading-[calc(max(1.20em,1.25rem))]">Note: Originally these macro tests download other scripts from the Red Canary repo to do other things with the macro, for the purposes of my testing, however, I only wanted to test the original macro execution so I modified these scripts slightly to just call out to Google instead of running the full blown tests.</code></p><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We generate our macro, which outputs an Excel file:</p><div class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0 flex flex-row gap-3 justify-center"><template id="P:1"></template></div><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now let&#x27;s take a look at what Sysmon shows us when this macro is executed, using the <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/SwiftOnSecurity/sysmon-config/blob/master/sysmonconfig-export.xml">SwiftOnSecurity Config</a></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Using this basic Splunk Query:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="9c08bab4452e43f59b27c4d5318f2d1a" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">index=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">sysmon EventCode</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-constant)">1</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">Image=*</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">Excel</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">*</span>
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">table</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">Image</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">,ParentImage,CommandLine</span></span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Gives us these results:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:2"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Not very interesting, the typical &quot;Excel has Spawned PowerShell or a Command Prompt&quot; detection has failed here, as these macros use techniques which circumvent this particular detection (More details about this are in the Red Canary Blog post linked above)</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">If we observe Excel behaviour through something like Procmon, we can see that Excel loads specific DLLs when a macro is loaded. We can configure Sysmon to look for this type of behaviour.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Let&#x27;s enhance our Sysmon config a little bit with the following:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="eed239c3afd04677a6f229cbc2b4fd0d" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;RuleGroup name=&quot;&quot; groupRelation=&quot;or&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;ImageLoad onmatch=&quot;include&quot;&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">            &lt;ImageLoaded condition=&quot;end with&quot;&gt;VBE7INTL.DLL&lt;/ImageLoaded&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">            &lt;ImageLoaded condition=&quot;end with&quot;&gt;VBEUI.DLL&lt;/ImageLoaded&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;/ImageLoad&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/RuleGroup&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">With this logic, we should see an event when any of the above DLLs are loaded.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">After updating the Sysmon config and running the macro again, we can now do something like:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="1e53cabb56964fc887680f07e65a8afd" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">index=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">sysmon RuleName</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-string-expression)">&quot;Macro Image Load&quot;</span>
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">stats</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">values</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">(ImageLoaded) </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">by</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">Image</span></span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Which gives us these results:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:3"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now we know that a macro was executed by Excel which is a great start. As mentioned earlier, these macro tests break typical process hierarchy detections, so searching for what spawned out of Excel directly is not going to work in this case.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">All we know so far from a detection standpoint is that Excel executed some kind of macro, but we don&#x27;t know what the macro did or whether it was malicious or not. We can, however, pivot off the data point that we <i class="font-italic">do</i> have and group our events by time to see what was launched around the time that the Excel macro was executed.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="a1a44f24b89f4f7f99531ceb0d3bd338" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">index=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">sysmon</span>
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| bin span</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">5s _time</span>
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">stats</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">values</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">(RuleName),</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">values</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">(</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">Image</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">),</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">values</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">(CommandLine) </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">by</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> _time</span></span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We group our events into buckets of 5 second time intervals - my thinking here is the malicious processes executed via the macro may not spawn directly from Excel, but they would be grouped together tightly by time.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">In this query, I am not querying for a specific event type, I just want to see all Sysmon events grouped into time buckets, and then I want to take a look at the events surrounding the &quot;Macro Image Load&quot; rule name.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Let&#x27;s take a look at the results:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:4"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We caught some false positives in our little dragnet, but also found the &#x27;malicious&#x27; commands executed by our macro.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Continuing with the Red Canary macro tests, let&#x27;s look at option 2 in the tests: <i class="font-italic">Chain Reaction Download and execute with Excel, wmiprvse</i></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Using the same time bucketing technique, we can see the execution of wmiprvse.exe around the time that an Excel macro was launched:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:5"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">If we observe Excel behaviour when launching normally versus launching a macro that loads wmiprvse.exe, we can see the wbemdisp.dll being loaded, so let&#x27;s add that to our Sysmon config as well:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="56f16f38d8ff4f92b72991793492bf2a" class="min-w-full inline-grid -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;Image condition=&quot;begin with&quot;&gt;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\&lt;/Image&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;ImageLoaded condition=&quot;is&quot;&gt;C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wbem\wbemdisp.dll&lt;/ImageLoaded&gt;<!-- -->

class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/Rule&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">I came across this particular detection technique in <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://twitter.com/SBousseaden">Samir</a>&#x27;s fantastic blog post:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://blog.menasec.net/2019/02/threat-hunting-doc-with-macro-invoking.html">https://blog.menasec.net/2019/02/threat-hunting-doc-with-macro-invoking.html </a></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><i class="font-italic">If you are at all interested in Threat Hunting, I highly encourage you to check that blog out and give Samir a follow</i></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">This rule will fire when the wbemdisp.dll is loaded by any executable within the Office16 folder, it can be tuned to be more specific as well.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Here&#x27;s what the data looks like in Splunk:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:6"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now let&#x27;s take a look at the Red Canary tests number 4 and 5 - Shell and ShellBrowserWindow. These two methods interact with COM, so we can configure our Sysmon Config as follows:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="4065bef8e94b4791831ab0b1c4b8d9f8" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;Rule groupRelation=&quot;and&quot; name=&quot;Office COM Image Load - Combase&quot;&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/Rule&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;Rule groupRelation=&quot;and&quot; name=&quot;Office COM Image Load - comsvc&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;Image condition=&quot;begin with&quot;&gt;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\&lt;/Image&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;ImageLoaded condition=&quot;is&quot;&gt;C:\Windows\SysWOW64\comsvcs.dll&lt;/ImageLoaded&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/Rule&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Firing up our macros again and looking at the following Splunk query:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="d4fb05b31935465f8d5cae5dd29a01ee" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">index=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">sysmon </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">Image=*</span><span </span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">stats</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">,RuleName</span></span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We can see Excel loading the Macro as well as COM DLLs:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:7"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now we know that Excel launched some kind of macro, and used COM, neat!</p><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="excel-4-macros" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid Macros</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://www.outflank.nl/">Outflank</a> publishes tons of next-level macro techniques regularly, let&#x27;s take a look at the <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/outflanknl/Scripts/blob/master/ShellcodeToJScript.js">following</a> script which is a Proof of Concept which uses COM to generated an Excel 4 Macro to load Shellcode via JScript.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">A few things stand out as abnormal using this technique, using the data we have already in our Sysmon config, we can see:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><ul class="space-y-2 w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">Excel Loading a COM DLL</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">Excel being launched from a non-standard directory</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--></ul><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:8"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="runpe" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#runpe" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg
