transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">RunPE</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">I used <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://twitter.com/itm4n">Clement Labro&#x27;s</a> implementation of RunPE in my testing, you can grab it <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/itm4n/VBA-RunPE">here</a> and read more about it here:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><ul class="space-y-2 w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://itm4n.github.io/vba-runpe-part1/">https://itm4n.github.io/vba-runpe-part1/</a></p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://itm4n.github.io/vba-runpe-part2/">https://itm4n.github.io/vba-runpe-part2/</a></p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--></ul><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Clement describes the technique succinctly:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><blockquote class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0 text-dark/7 border-l-2 pl-6 py-3 border-dark/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:border-light/2 space-y-4"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl">[RunPE] consists in running code inside the memory of a legit process in order to hide its actual activity.</p><!--/$--></blockquote><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">To my simpleton brain, if I hear &quot;<i class="font-italic">inside the memory of a legit process</i>&quot; I think of injection, so let&#x27;s configure our Sysmon config to look for this, with the following snippet:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="8681542ec8e8463892ed892de2910f27" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;RuleGroup name=&quot;&quot; groupRelation=&quot;or&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;ProcessAccess onmatch=&quot;include&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">        &lt;Rule groupRelation=&quot;and&quot; name=&quot;Office Injection via VBA&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">            &lt;SourceImage condition=&quot;begin with&quot;&gt;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\Root\Office16\&lt;/SourceImage&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">            &lt;CallTrace condition=&quot;contains&quot;&gt;\Microsoft Shared\VBA&lt;/CallTrace&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">        &lt;/Rule&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;/ProcessAccess&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/RuleGroup&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Taking a look at the data this produces, we see Word injecting into Word via VBA:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:9"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Putting the pieces together a little bit, we&#x27;re starting to get a good idea of what our Office Processes are doing, we can see:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><ul class="space-y-2 w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">WMI ImageLoads by Office Processes</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">VBA ImageLoads by Office Processes</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">Office Injections via VBA</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--><!--$--><li class="leading-normal flex items-start"><div class="text-base leading-normal flex items-center justify-center mr-1 min-h-[1lh] min-w-6 text-dark/6 dark:text-light/5"><div class="before:font-var before:content-[--pseudoBefore--content]" style="--pseudoBefore--content:&#x27;•&#x27;;--font-family:Arial;font-size:min(1.5em, 24px);line-height:1"></div></div><div class="space-y-2 flex flex-col flex-1"><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl min-h-[1lh] flip-heading-hash [&amp;:is(h2)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h3)&gt;div]:mt-0 [&amp;:is(h4)&gt;div]:mt-0">COM use by Office Processes</p><!--/$--></div></li><!--/$--></ul><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="evil-clippy" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#evil-clippy" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">Evil Clippy</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">EvilClippy is a tool created by Outflank that provides functionality to stomp VBA code and hide macros from the Office GUI, you can grab the tool here:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/outflanknl/EvilClippy">https://github.com/outflanknl/EvilClippy</a></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">And read more about VBA Stomping here:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://vbastomp.com/">https://vbastomp.com/</a></p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">I want to keep things super simple so I&#x27;m using the following &quot;real&quot; VBA code:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="27377b933c9444b5a72a757afa966fee" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">Sub AutoOpen()<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    Call Shell(&quot;powershell.exe&quot;, vbNormalFocus)<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">End Sub</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">To launch a PowerShell Window when I open up my Word doc, but I&#x27;m using EvilClippy to &#x27;stomp&#x27; the document with the following VBA Code:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="6f0d053df49b441b858e42128cf4d8ef" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">Sub AutoOpen()<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    Call Shell(&quot;calc.exe&quot;, vbNormalFocus)<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">End Sub</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">This is what my document looks like, the VBA code is telling me the macro will launch calc, but when I Enable Content, the document will launch PowerShell instead, sneaky!</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Fake Macro Code:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:a"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">What the document actually does:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:b"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">While Sysmon can&#x27;t detect VBA Stomping specifically, our current Sysmon config gives us a bunch of clues that a macro was executed and that our Word document executed PowerShell.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Looking at the following Splunk query:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="e00488a574c545ccb12055b60030c936" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">index=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">sysmon EventCode</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">=</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-constant)">10</span>
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm"><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)">| </span><span style="color:var(--shiki-token-keyword)">table</span><span style="color:var(--shiki-foreground)"> SourceImage,TargetImage,RuleName</span></span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We can see our earlier injection Sysmon config snippet being put to work:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:c"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="putting-it-together-covenant" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#putting-it-together-covenant" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">Putting it together - Covenant</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Thus far we&#x27;ve looked at isolated techniques, but how well does our Sysmon configuration work for a macro that launches a Covenant stager - let&#x27;s find out.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Covenant is available here: <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/cobbr/Covenant">https://github.com/cobbr/Covenant</a> - thank you <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://twitter.com/cobbr_io">Ryan</a>!</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">And I am using the following post to generate my Macro: <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://3xpl01tc0d3r.blogspot.com/2020/02/gadgettojscript-covenant-donut.html">https://3xpl01tc0d3r.blogspot.com/2020/02/gadgettojscript-covenant-donut.html</a> - Thank you <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://twitter.com/chiragsavla94">Chirag</a>!</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">With everything in place, we can start our Word document and confirm that we see the callback in Covenant:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:d"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Checking our logs, we see that the VBA Images were loaded, so we know a macro ran, but not much else, there&#x27;s no processes spawned from Word since everything happens in memory. How can we enhance our detections further?</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We know that Covenant is a .NET framework, so we can assume that it needs to load some type of .NET DLLs at startup.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Let&#x27;s add the following to our Sysmon config:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="b2b5bb9b56e34c98a64fa2c1751832e7" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none groupRelation=&quot;and&quot; name=&quot;Office .NET Abuse: Assembly DLLs&quot;&gt;<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;Image condition=&quot;begin with&quot;&gt;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\&lt;/Image&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/Rule&gt;<!-- -->

</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">    &lt;ImageLoaded condition=&quot;end with&quot;&gt;clr.dll&lt;/ImageLoaded&gt;<!-- -->

class="ml-3 block text-sm">&lt;/Rule&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Let&#x27;s run our macro again and check the logs with the following query:</p><!--/$--><!--$--><div class="group/codeblock grid grid-flow-col w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="flex items-center justify-start [grid-area:1/1] text-sm gap-2"></div><button class="group-hover/codeblock:opacity-[1] transition-opacity duration-75 opacity-0 text-xs [grid-area:2/1] z-[2] justify-self-end backdrop-blur-md leading-none self-start ring-1 ring-dark/2 text-dark/7 bg-transparent rounded-md mr-2 mt-2 p-1 hover:ring-dark/3 dark:ring-light/2 dark:text-light/7 dark:hover:ring-light/3 print:hidden">Copy</button><pre class="[grid-area:2/1] relative overflow-auto bg-light-2 dark:bg-dark-2 border-light-4 dark:border-dark-4 hide-scroll rounded-md straight-corners:rounded-sm"><code id="390af168dde64734bc506bc19281f685" class="min-w-full inline-grid [grid-template-columns:auto_1fr] py-2 px-2 [counter-reset:line]"><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:only-child]:hover:ring-transparent [&amp;.highlighted]:rounded-none [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted]:rounded-t-md [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">index=sysmon EventCode=7<!-- -->
</span></span><span class="grid [grid-template-columns:subgrid] col-span-2 relative ring-1 ring-transparent hover:ring-dark-4/5 hover:z-[1] dark:hover:ring-light-4/4 rounded [&amp;.highlighted:first-child]:rounded-t-md [&amp;.highlighted:first-child&gt;*]:mt-1 [&amp;.highlighted:last-child]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:last-child&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-b-md [&amp;.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))&gt;*]:mb-1 [&amp;:not(.highlighted)_+_.highlighted:has(+:not(.highlighted))]:rounded-md"><span class="ml-3 block text-sm">| stats values(ImageLoaded) by Image,RuleName</span></span></code></pre></div><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:e"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now you know that a macro was executed and that the Office process executing the macro loaded the DLLs necessary for some kind of .NET functionality, a great jumping off point for further investigation.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Check out the <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/tree/master/rules/windows/sysmon">Sigma Repo</a> where I contributed a few rules looking for this kind of activity, we can use <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://uncoder.io/">uncoder.io</a> to convert the Sigma rule into a Splunk query:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:f"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We could also convert Sigma rules to Splunk searches programmatically with <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/P4T12ICK/Sigma2SplunkAlert">this</a> awesome project by <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://twitter.com/bareiss_patrick">Patrick Bareiss</a></p><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="bonus-round-velociraptor" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#bonus-round-velociraptor" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">Bonus Round - <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://github.com/Velocidex">Velociraptor</a></div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now that your cool new macro alerts have fired, you&#x27;d probably want to take a closer look at the host.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Let&#x27;s try that with Velociraptor, we find our host, and collect some macro artifacts:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:10"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">Now we take a look at the results, and we can see that not only did Velociraptor find our macros, but it also ripped them open, revealing the actual VBA code:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:11"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">While this output is great, our VBA stomped macro keeps it&#x27;s secrets :)</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:12"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">We can also see the output of any Trust Record modifications for further evidence of macro execution:</p><!--/$--><!--$?--><template id="B:13"></template><div role="status" aria-busy="true" class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="ring-1 ring-dark/2 overflow-hidden relative grid dark:ring-light/1 rounded-md h-full aspect-video [max-width:calc(48rem-1px)]"><div class="w-full bg-dark-4/4 dark:bg-light-3/1 grid grid-area-1-1 overflow-hidden [mask:conic-gradient(from_90deg_at_1px_1px,_#0000_90deg,_#0003_0)_calc(50%+1px)_calc(0%+47px)_/_96px_96px]"><div class="aspect-square from-dark-4 to-transparent grid-area-1-1 relative origin-[50%_50%] top-[50%] self-stretch bg-transparent will-change-transform animate-[rotateLoop_2s_linear_infinite] [background-image:conic-gradient(from_-90deg_at_50%_50%,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_0deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_90deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops)_280deg)] dark:from-light-4/6"></div></div></div></div><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">The folks at Outflank made a nice post about trust records <a class="underline underline-offset-2 text-primary hover:text-primary-700 transition-colors " href="https://outflank.nl/blog/2018/01/16/hunting-for-evil-detect-macros-being-executed/">here</a> including providing a Sysmon config snippet to monitor for this kind of activity in real-time, how awesome!</p><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="closing-notes" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-[0] group-focus:opacity-[0] md:group-hover:md:opacity-[1] md:group-focus:md:opacity-[1] mt-[0.75em]"><a href="#closing-notes" aria-label="Direct link to heading" class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg style="mask-image:url(https://ka-p.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.6.0/svgs/regular/hashtag.svg?v=2&amp;token=a463935e93);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center" class="gb-icon w-3.5 h-[1lh] transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">Closing Notes</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p class="w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0">My aim with this post was to provide some detection ideas for an attack vector that is commonly utilized by real-world malware and attackers. The Sysmon configuration snippets, Splunk queries and Sigma rules will undoubtedly generate false positives in a real corporate environment and are not a silver bullet for detecting malicious attacker activity via macros. I&#x27;m sure there are bypasses available and used for this stuff, but you have to start somewhere and at least make attackers work for a foothold in your environment.</p><!--/$--><!--$--><h3 id="more-credits" class="text-2xl font-semibold group relative grid w-full mx-auto decoration-primary/6 max-w-3xl page-api-block:ml-0"><div class="grid grid-area-1-1 relative -ml-6 w-7 border-0 class="inline-flex h-full items-start dark:text-light/3 dark:shadow-none dark:ring-0 leading-snug"><svg transition-colors text-transparent group-hover:text-dark/6 dark:group-hover:text-light/5 lg:w-4"></svg></a></div><div class="grid-area-1-1 z-[1] mt-[0.75em]">More Credits</div></h3><!--/$--><!--$--><p
